short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that helps you list multiple items on steam, fast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple tool to help bulk list/edit items in your inventory to the steam marketplace.

Create a list of items you want to list, edit the prices and see the total amount you will receive update automatically and accurately. A confirmation dialog will prompt you so you don't accidentally list them without further review.

This is something that the existing solution from steam really lacks and slows down the process of listing a lot of items at a time so I hope this helps as much as it helped my friends and I!

This was made within 24 hours and the code is open source, I will push updates as needed to fix bugs and to implement new useful features that are requested or I think of!
